page.title: 19LIFESTYLES..HOME LIFE cont.
page.content: AN AFTERNOON AND EVENING IN THE LIFE OF A SEVENTEEN YEAR OLD SCHOOLGIRL: 1.30-4.00 P.M. Charlotte follows her usual timetable of classes at school. 4.00 P.M. She catches the school bus to her friends house, collects her bike and cycles home. She changes into jeans, a tee-shirt and helps her mother make the tea. This night consists of steak pie, potatoes and peas, followed by rhubarb and custard. 5.30 P.M. After washing up the dishes her mother takes Charolette into Cupar where she works in Templeton's,a local supermarket. She stacks shelves there for three hours, three nights a week. 9.00 P.M. Her mother collects her from work and takes her home, where she has a cup of coffee and then goes to bed.
